refsynopsisdiv.para: This operator is designed for internal use.

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Cancel a currently running query by query id.

The query id can be obtained from the SciDB log or via the list('queries') command. SciDB maintains query context information for each completed and in-progress query in the server. If the user issues a "ctrl-C" or abort from the client, the query is cancelled and its context is removed from the server.
